Desc.eng: Your basic melee attack, inflicting damage based on your melee weapon.
Attack ignores %physicalresistance_% of target's Physical Resistance and does %damagebonus_ Damage.
Target is stunned for %stunduration_ seconds.
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Each kill with Strike yields %rageperkill_ extra Rage points.
Each hit with Strike heals you for %hpperhit_ HP.
Your basic ranged attack inflicting damage based on your ranged weapon.
This shot will explode on impact, causing %blastdamage_ of its Damage to everyone within a %blastradius_ meter of the target.
Target will be slowed by %slow_ for %slowduration_ seconds.
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
You regain %manaperhit_ Mana with each hit.
Attack speed with Shoot increased by %attackratebonus_.
Makes 3 consecutive attacks in quick succession against enemies in front of you. If there is only one opponent, all 3 strikes land on him.

effect0.eng: Per Hit (Physical):\n- Damage Effectiveness: %weapondamage_ \n- Total Damage: +%lvlscale_

Desc.eng: Targets are stunned for %stunduration_ seconds.
Targets bleed for 10 seconds, taking %bleeding_ of the received Flowing Combo damage each second. Does not stack.
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Increases added enchantment damage by %enchantdmg_
Adds a fourth attack.
Tapping into mystical energies, you make a wide, 120 degree swing, causing Damage to every enemy in front of you up to 3 meters away. While using Cleave, you incur a 50% Defense penalty.
Each enemy hit by the attack heals you by %healperhit_ of your maximum HP.
Enemies struck have a %stunchance_ chance of being stunned for %stunduration_ seconds.
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Range is increased by 1 meter.
Defense penalty reduced to 35%.
Extensive training has made you better at defensive combat, providing a bonus to your Deflect ability.

effect0.eng: Your Deflect ability is increased by %parry_.

Desc.eng: Increases Defense by 10%.
Adds %parrybonus_ bonus to your Deflect ability.
Increases max Hit Points.

effect0.eng: Max Hit Points are increased by %hitpoints_.

Desc.eng: Regenerates %hpregeneration_ of your maximum HP per second while your HP is under 25%.
Enhances melee weapon damage and makes targets more vulnerable to further attacks.

effect1.eng: +10% damage vulnerability for 1s

Desc.eng: Targets bleed for 10 seconds, taking %dot_ of the received Bash damage each second. Does not stack.
Damage is increased by %hitpoints_ of target's current hitpoints.
Drains health equal to %heal_ of your max Hit Points.
Bash powerups cost 3 less Rage.
Bash attacks have a 15% chance of stunning.
Hits a single enemy with a normal attack and generates lightning bolts that damage additional enemies nearby.

effect0.eng: %attack_ Physical Damage to first target (%weapondamage_ of Weapon Damage)

effect1.eng: Hits the target and %splitcount_ more enemies for %damagepoints_ Lightning Damage (%multipledamage_ of Weapon Damage)

Desc.eng: %strikecount_ more enemies are struck by the lightning bolts.
Enemies struck are paralyzed for %durationbonus_ seconds.
Enemies struck have a %killchance_ chance of dying outright. (Powerful enemies may be immune to this.)
The lightning bolts hit one additional enemy.
Base melee damage is increased from 50% to 100%.
A ranged attack that deals damage in a 1.5 meter radius around the target it hits.
Area of effect increased by %blastradiusbonus_ meters.
The explosion becomes more ferocious, causing %damagebonus_ more damage.
The explosion steals mana from the target, equal to %manasteal_ of the damage dealt.
Each kill with this skill grants %rageperkill_ Rage.
Adds %firedamage_ Fire damage.
Hurls a ball of fire towards a target, burning the area within a 4 meter radius, and possibly knocking foes off their feet.

effect1.eng: Targets knocked down if damage exceeds %maxhpdamagepercent_ of their max HP.

Desc.eng: Enemies struck burn for 10 seconds, taking %dot_ of the original received damage each second.
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Blast area of effect is increased by %radiusbonus_ meters.
Blast area of effect is increased by 1 meter.
Cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.
Generates a blast of ice around the hunter, dealing damage to everyone within 3 meters and freezing them for 1 second.

effect0.eng:
Blast (Ice):
- Damage Effectiveness: %weapondamage_ 
- Total Damage: +%lvlscale_ 
- Ice Blast gains 50% additional damage from added Elemental damage

Desc.eng: Blast area of effect is increased by %radiusbonus_ meters.
Targets are frozen for %freezeduration_ seconds longer. (Nemesises will only be slowed to half their movement and attack speed.)
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Blast area of effect is increased by 1 meter.
A violent shockwave rips through the earth in front of the caster, damaging everyone in its (4 meter wide, 15 meter long) wake.
The shockwave is widened by %widthbonus_ meters.
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Burns targets for %burningduration_ seconds, who take %firedamage_ of the original earthquake damage each second.
Mana cost reduced by %manacostdecrease_.
Enemies struck are knocked down if the damage exceeds %hppercentlimit_ of their maximum health.
Provides a passive %modifiervalue_(physical_resistance)% bonus to your Physical Resistance.
Increases your max Rage value.
All powerups cost 1 less Rage point.
Each kill generates 1 more Rage point.
Deals normal ranged damage and slows targets by 50%.

effect1.eng: Target slowed for %slowduration_ seconds (does not stack)

Desc.eng: Slowed targets bleed, taking %bleeding_ of the received Icicle Shot damage each second while the slow effect lasts. Does not stack.
Targets are frozen for %freezeduration_ seconds. (Nemesises will only be slowed to half their movement and attack speed.)
Adds an area of effect of %blastradius_ meters to all effects (including those from other Powerups).
The shot goes through the target hitting any other enemies along its path. The first target is injured, the others only slow down.
Slow is increased to %slow_.
Deals Poison Damage in a %blastradius_ meter radius area. Targets struck also suffer Poison damage over time and become more vulnerable to further attacks.

effect1.eng: %vulnerability_ Damage Vulnerability for 10 seconds (does not stack)

effect2.eng:
DOT (Poison):
- Damage Effectiveness: %dotweapondamage_ 
- Total Damage: +%lvlscaleDOT_
- Lasts 10 seconds and does not stack

Desc.eng: Poison Damage over time is increased to %dotdamagebonus_ of Weapon Damage (does not stack).
The vulnerability lasts %counterduration_ seconds longer.
Area of effect is increased by %blastradiusbonus_ meters.
Base damage of Poisoned Shot is increased to %weapondamage_ of Weapon Damage.
Enemies are slowed by %slow_ while poisoned.
Fires a burst of %shotcount_ shots at once in a %shotangle_° arc.
The shots have a %passthroughchance_ chance of flying right through the enemy and potentially damaging another target.
%shotcountbonus_ more shots are fired, and the firing arc is widened by %shotanglebonus_°.
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Critical chance is increased by %criticalhit_.
Critical Damage is increased by %criticaldamagemul_.
Provides a passive %modifiervalue_(speed)% bonus to your Movement Speed.

Every slain enemy gives you a Weapon Damage bonus for 4 seconds. This effect stacks a maximum of 3 times, any more kills will only make it last longer. Going 4 seconds without killing anything will snap you out of Fury.

effect0.eng: %furydamage_ Weapon Damage per kill for 4 seconds (stacks a maximum of 3 times).

Desc.eng: Fury lasts 2 seconds longer.
Fury stacks 5 times.
A 2 meter wide, 15 meter long bolt of lightning will shoot from the hunter towards the target, shocking everyone in its path.
The first victim struck releases %splitcount_ smaller bolts, which strike the nearest targets, causing the same amount of Damage.
Enemies struck are paralyzed for %shockduration_ seconds.
Enemies struck have a %killchance_ chance of dying outright. (Powerful enemies may be immune to this.)
Bolt length increased to 20 meters.
Cooldown is reduced by 1 second.
Creates a ring of fire around the caster that lasts for 5 seconds, and burns enemies within 3 meters.

effect0.eng:
Hit (Fire):
- Damage Effectiveness: %weapondamage_ per second
- Total Damage: +%lvlscale_ 
- Embracing Flames gains 50% additional damage from added Elemental damage

Desc.eng: Absorbs %damagereduction_ of incoming damage (all types) for the duration.
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Duration increased by %durationbonus_ seconds.
Burn radius increased by 1 meter.
Embracing Flames powerups cost %powerupcostdecrease_ less Rage.

The Ray of Destruction runs from the caster towards the mouse cursor while you keep the the mouse button pressed, stopping at 15 meters. Foes hit by the ray will suffer damage every second until they get out of the ray or die.

XBox.eng: The Ray of Destruction runs forward from the caster while you keep it active, stopping at the first solid obstacle it hits within 15 meters. Foes hit by the ray will suffer damage every second until they get out of the ray or die.

effect0.eng: Ray (Combined Damage):\n- Damage Effectiveness: 500% per second\n- Total Damage: +%lvlscale_

effect1.eng: Costs %manacost_ Mana per second.

Desc.eng: Targets killed by the ray explode, causing damage equal to %deathburstdamage_ of their maximum HP to anyone within 2 meters.
Each enemy hit by the attack heals you by %heal_ of your maximum HP during the first 3 seconds.
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_ during the first 3 seconds.
Mana cost per second is reduced by %manacostdecrease_.
Channeling this skill temporarily increases Critical Damage by %criticaldamage_ per second. Once you stop channeling, this bonus is lost.
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Enemies struck are slowed by %slow_.
Increases the Weapon Damage of all elemental damage skills.
Grants a 10% increase to Elemental Resistance.
Provides a percentage and a fixed bonus to all Resistances.

effect1.eng: All resistances are increased by %fullresistancepercent_.

Desc.eng: Slowing and immobilization effects last %holddurationdecrease_ less time on your character.
Katarina's ghastly touch (be it ranged or melee) develops the ability to paralyze enemies with fear. Sometimes.

effect0.eng: Adds a %chance_% paralyze chance to Katarina's attacks (paralyze lasts %duration_ seconds)

Desc.eng: The magical bond that connects Katarina's ghost to you grows stronger, enabling you to attack as relentlessly as her.

effect0.eng: Increases Van Helsing's attack speed and cooldown reduction by %modifiervalue_(attack_rate)%

Desc.eng: The magical bond now enables Katarina's spectral powers to be manifested through your attacks, increasing the damage they do.
Katarina's deadly attacks develop the ability to drain life force from her foes, healing your wounds in the process.

effect0.eng: Heals Van Helsing for %heal_ of his max HP with each strike

Desc.eng: Katarina will now also drain spirit essence from enemies, replenishing your magical reserves.

effect0.eng: Rejuvenates Van Helsing for %mana_ of his max Mana with each strike

Desc.eng: Katarina's presence creates a faint spectral nimbus around you, which deflects some of the incoming attacks.
Your companion better attunes herself to the magical energies around her, increasing your chances of finding items imbued with them.
You gain an intense connection to the otherworld through Katarina, making your attacks more likely to land a devastating hit.

effect0.eng: Increases Van Helsing's Critical Chance by %critchance_

Desc.eng: The bond between you and Katarina enables her to protect you by taking part of the damage you receive.

effect0.eng: Transfers %modifiervalue_(guardian_damage_reduction)% of all damage received by Van Helsing to Katarina

Desc.eng: The magical bond extends Katarina's spectral resistance to you, protecting you from all types of damage.

effect0.eng: +%modifiervalue_(full_resistance)% to all of Van Helsing's Resistances

Desc.eng: Lady Katarina gains a bonus to her Resistances.

effect0.eng: +%format_(%)%customtag_(1) to all of Lady Katarina's Resistances

effect1.eng: +%modifiervalue_(full_resistance) to all of Lady Katarina's Resistances

Desc.eng: With each attack, there's a chance that an area effect spell is cast centered on the target, slowing every enemy down by 50%.

effect0.eng: %customchance_% chance to cast spell with each attack

effect1.eng: spell slows enemies within 5 meters for 3 seconds

Desc.eng: With each attack, there's a chance that an area effect spell is cast centered on the target, giving 25% Vulnerability.

effect0.eng: %customchance_% chance to cast spell with each attack

effect1.eng: spell causes %modifiervalue_(vulnerability)% vulnerability to enemies within 5 meters for 3 seconds

Desc.eng: Lady Katarina gains the ability to dodge attacks that would cause her to lose at least half of her current Hit Points.
Lady Katarina's Damage is increased.
Lady Katarina receives a boost to her Hit Points.
Upon death, Lady Katarina will release a huge explosion.
Lady Katarina's attacks become more furious and quick as lightning.
Causes %attack_ Physical Damage to nearby monsters every second.
Adds %modifierpoints_(defense) to your Defense (%modifiervalue_(defense) of your Weapon Damage) but you can't gain any Rage while it's active.
Slows every nearby enemy down by %modifiervalue_.
Doubles the Rage generated with each kill if you are below 50% of your max health.
Grants you a bonus to Damage if there are no enemies near you.

effect0.eng: Damage is increased by %damage_ if there are no enemies within 10 meters.

Desc.eng: The bonus is applied if no enemies are within 8 meters.
If only a single enemy is within distance, you still gain 50% of the bonus.
Increases your Ice Damage by %modifiervalue_(ice_damage)%.
Increases your Movement Speed by %modifiervalue_(speed)% if you are below 50% of your max health.
Increases your Fire Damage by %modifiervalue_(fire_damage)%.
Increases the Mana Regeneration of you and your allies by %modifiervalue_(group_mana_regeneration).
Increases the Health Regeneration of you and your allies by %modifiervalue_(group_hp_regeneration).
Every point of Rage you spend heals you.

effect0.eng: Heal %heal_ of your maximum health per Rage point spent.

Desc.eng: When activating powerups, there is a %freepowerupchance_ chance that you regain spent Rage points immediately.
You gain %manaperrage_ Mana for each Rage point you spend.
Every attack heals you for a fixed amount. (Stacks with other similar effects.)
The cooldown for health potions is reduced by %hppotioncooldowndecrease_.
Each killed enemy heals you for %hpperkill_ of your maximum Hit Points.
Generates %modifiervalue_(rage_growth_per_tick) Rage every second.
While active, every ally gains Rage for your kills, too!
Increases your Lightning Damage by %modifiervalue_(lightning_damage)%.
Increases your Mana Regeneration by %modifiervalue_(mana_regeneration).
Increases your Poison Damage by %modifiervalue_(poison_damage)%.
Turns the blood of your enemies into raw magical power, which you can draw on as you deal damage to them.
The cooldown for mana potions is reduced by 10%.
Each killed enemy recharges 2% of your maximum Mana.
Lowers the Cooldown of your tricks.
Each time a trick is activated there is a 5% chance that the cooldown will be reset immediately.
10% of the cooldown reduction is applied to all skills, not just tricks.
Increases your Critical Damage multiplier as long as you have max Rage.

effect0.eng: +%modifiervalue_(critical_damage_mul)% Bonus Critical Damage while at max Rage

Desc.eng: The bonus is now applied from 90% of maximum Rage.
At maximum Rage you gain +1% Critical Hit Chance.
Increases your Health Regeneration by %modifiervalue_(hp_regeneration).
Increases the amount of Damage you mete out when you are surrounded by several enemies.

effect0.eng: %damage_ Weapon Damage when at least 3 enemies are nearby (within 3 meters)

Desc.eng: Enemies within 4 meters now count.
You gain 1% life steal in addition to the damage bonus.
Increases your chance of finding Gold.
Chance to find potions is increased by 15%.
Magic Find chance is increased by 10%.
Reduces the duration of negative effects on you by %modifiervalue_(negative_action_duration)%.
There is a 5% chance that negative effects don't affect you at all.
Decreases incoming damage from duration based harmful effects by 20%.
Grants constant damage reduction against all damage types.
The aura also grants 10% additional Defense.
The damage reduction now applies to your allies within 5 meters.
Makes your attacks ignore %modifiervalue_(armor_piercing) of your enemy's Resistance.
By conjuring an arcane sigil of Umbra this spell heals all allies within its range.

effect0.eng: Heals players for %healpoints_ Hit Points within 10m (%heal_ of your maximum Health)

Desc.eng: Movement speed is increased by %speed_ for 5 seconds.
Defense is increased by %defense_ for 5 seconds.
Healing is increased by +%healbonus_.
Cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.
The spell also recharges 10% of your maximum Mana.
Provides %modifiervalue_(damage_against)% Damage against Huge monsters.
Increases your Critical Chance by %modifiervalue_(critical_hit)%.

Turns you Ethereal for a short time, making you invincible and increasing your movement speed by 50%, but also causing you to be unable to attack. When you become ethereal, enemies around you take damage from the shock.

effect1.eng: Hit (Poison):\n- Damage Effectiveness: %weapondamage_ \n- Total Damage: +%lvlscale_

Desc.eng: Duration is increased by %durationbonus_ seconds.
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Shock radius is increased by %blastradiusbonus_ meters.
The ethereal shock slows enemies by 50% for 2 seconds.
While you are ethereal you regain %hpmanaregen_ of your maximum Mana and Hit Points.
Nearby enemies will flee from you for 3 seconds.
Makes you completely immune to Fire Damage.
Makes you completely immune to Ice Damage.
Monsters in %modifiervalue_(mockery_range) meters will attack you instead of anyone else.
Makes you completely immune to Lightning Damage.
Increases your Defense and also causes part of the Damage done to you to be taken from your Mana.

effect0.eng: Defense increased by %modifierpoints_(defense) (%modifiervalue_(defense) of your Weapon Damage)

effect1.eng: Reduces Damage suffered by %modifiervalue_(damage_reduction)% but you lose %mana_ of the Damage from your Mana

Desc.eng: You gain +10% to your resistances for the duration.

Makes you completely invulnerable to Damage for a short time.

You regain %manaregen_ of your maximum mana each second.
Movement speed increased by %speed_.

Makes you completely invulnerable to Damage for a short time.
You regenerate %hpregen_ of your maximum health each second.
You regain %manaregen_ of your maximum mana each second.
Increases your movement speed by +%speed_.
You gain +%damage_ damage for the duration of the skill.
Cooldown is reduced by %cooldowndecrease_ seconds.

Freezes time around you and creates a bubble of personal time where you are free to act. Attacking, moving or casting spells causes this bubble to shrink, other actions like shuffling items in your inventory are completely free. When the bubble shrinks away completely, the world returns to normal.
Moving during the spell costs half the usual time.
You gain 10% increased damage for the duration of the spell.
Increases your ability to Deflect enemy attacks temporarily.
Allows you to telepo... walk through the Ink instantly up to a maximum of 200 meters.
Bestows a Curse on the enemies you hit while this trick is in effect.
You partially fade into the ink and burst forward a short distance with inhuman speed. Any enemies you pass through take damage from the shock.

effect0.eng: Move to the mouse cursor in a split second (obstacles will stop you).

XBox.eng: Burst forward 20 meters in a split second

effect1.eng: Enemies along the way (Physical):\n- Damage Effectiveness: %weapondamage_ \n- Total Damage: +%lvlscale_

Enemies struck are afflicted with %vulnerability_ vulnerability.

Enemies struck are slowed by %chill_ for 2 seconds.
You partially fade into the ink and burst forward a short distance with blinding speed. Any enemies you pass through take damage from the shock.

You and all your allies within a 10m range gain a bonus to damage and critical hit chance.

effect0.eng: +%modifiervalue_(damage)% Weapon Damage to all players within 10m

effect1.eng: +%modifiervalue_(critical_hit)% Critical Hit Chance to all players within 10m

Desc.eng: You and your allies also gain a 30% increase to maximum mana. Your allies lose this bonus if they go out of range.
You and your allies also gain a 20% increase to Critical Damage. Your allies lose this bonus if they go out of range.
You summon an ethereal shield that deflects incoming attacks in a 180 degree arc. While using the shield, your character cannot take any other actions.

effect0.eng: Deflects %modifiervalue_(front_full_resistance)% damage from attacks in 180 degree arc

Desc.eng: This aura channels your Rage into your Ghostly Companion, restoring her incorporeal body.

effect0.eng: Heals Lady Katarina by %heal_ for every point of Rage you spend

Desc.eng: When Katarina dies, there is a 10% chance that she rematerializes immediately.
Each point of rage you spend increases Katarina's damage by 1% for 5 seconds.

Summons two illusionary copies of Lady Katarina. These copies will fight just like her, even dealing damage but they will disappear if reduced to 0 HP or if the duration is over. They will take Lady Katarina's current fighting form (Can't be used if she is in Ghost Form!).

effect0.eng: The illusions start at %pethpmul_ Hit Points.

Desc.eng: Duration is increased by %durationbonus_ seconds.
Copies deal %petdamagebonus_ more damage.
There is a %onemorechance_ chance to create one additional copy.
When the copies disappear or die, they heal both you and Katarina for %disappearheal_ of maximum Hit Points.
The copies disappear with a scream dealing %disappearblastweapondamage_ of their damage in a 3 meter radius.

Summons two illusionary copies of Lady Katarina. These copies will fight just like her, even dealing damage but they will disappear if reduced to 0 HP or if the duration is over. They will take Lady Katarina's current fighting form (Can't be used if she is in Ghost Form!).

effect0.eng: The illusions start at %pethpmul_ Hit Points.

decoy.eng: %s: +%.3g%% health for the copies (+%.3g%% per level)

Copies deal %petdamagebonus_ more damage.
There is a %onemorechance_ chance to create one additional copy.
When the copies disappear or die, they heal both you and Katarina for %disappearheal_ of maximum Hit Points.
The copies disappear with a scream dealing %disappearblastweapondamage_ of their damage in a 3 meter radius.
You are slowed down while you are in the Frozen area.
You are slowed down while you are in the Frozen area.
You are burning and will continue to suffer Fire Damage.
You are slowed down while you are in the affected area.
You are Stunned and unable to act.
You are Stunned and unable to act.
You are bleeding and will continue to suffer Physical Damage.
You are bleeding and will continue to suffer Physical Damage.
Increases your Mana Regeneration by 2.
You receive a +%modifiervalue_(damage)% bonus to Damage.
You receive a +%modifiervalue_(critical_hit)% bonus to your Critical Chance and every enemy will die a rather gruesome death...
You receive a +%modifiervalue_(xp_gained)% bonus to XP gained.
You receive a +%modifiervalue_(item_find_chance)% bonus to finding Magic items.
Heals you to maximum HP.
Restores you to maximum Mana.
You receive 100% invulnerability for 10 seconds.
You receive a +3% / sec HP regeneration bonus for 60 seconds.
You receive a +3% / sec Mana regeneration bonus for 60 seconds.
You receive a +100% bonus to Damage for 30 seconds.
All damage you receive in Battle Royal are decreased by 70%.
You receive a +20% bonus to HP and Damage until you are the target in Battle Royal.
You receive a +%modifiervalue_(item_find_chance)% bonus to finding Magic items.
You are slowed down by 20%.
All damage you receive is increased by 10%.
The Magus increases the movement speed of an ally.
The Magus heals one of his allies.
Your mana is drained continuously when nearby this monster.
You are slowed down by 40%.
Your movement and attack speed are slowed down by 40%.

You are slowed down by 25%.
You are Stunned and unable to act.
You are Stunned and unable to act.
A special boost from the Elite Pack, providing a +50% bonus to the Magic Item Find chance of everyone in your party!
Creates two bolts of electrical energy, which seek out your target (or the nearest enemy if no target is designated) causing lightning damage.

effect0.eng: Per Bolt (Lightning):\n- Damage Effectiveness: %weapondamage_ \n- Total Damage: +%lvlscale_

Desc.eng: Number of bolts created increased to %boltcount_.
Each bolt recharges %manaperhit_ of your maximum Mana upon impact.
The bolts paralyze enemies struck for %shockduration_ seconds.
Energy Bolt powerups cost 1 less Rage.
The bolts do 50% damage to all enemies within a 1 meter radius of impact.
Launches three ice shards in a 60° arc which fly through all enemies along their 13 meter long paths causing ice damage to them.

effect0.eng: %attack_ Ice Damage (%weapondamage_ of Weapon Damage) per shard

Desc.eng: Enemies struck are frozen for %durationbonus_ seconds.
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Enemies struck are slowed by 50% for %durationbonus_(1) seconds (both movement and attack).
The attack range of the shards is increased by 5 meters.
Two additional shards are launched in a 30° arc.

The targeted enemy becomes friendly for the duration of the spell and attacks the nearest enemy within 20 meters. The spell also grants the target a damage bonus while controlled. (Note that the spell's duration is reduced for stronger enemies. The most powerful ones may even be immune altogether).

effect0.eng: The controlled creature gains %modifiervalue_(damage_reduction)% damage reduction for the duration

Desc.eng: Controlled creature gains an additional %modifiervalue_(damage)% bonus damage.
Controlled creature recharges %manasteal_ of your Maximum Mana with each hit.
Controlled creature heals you for %heal_ of your Maximum HP with each hit.
Cooldown is reduced by 1 second.
If a controlled creature dies, an explosion occurs causing Physical Damage to enemies within 2 meters. The damage is equal to the creature's maximum Hit Points.

You draw a line on the ground (by keeping the button pressed) thus creating a 1 meter thick wall of fire that burn enemies who pass through it. It can be of any shape or length, but the longer the wall, the more Mana it consumes. (Base Mana cost is 10 which doubles with each additional meter.)

XBox.eng: A wall of flames appears 10 meters in front of you.

effect0.eng: Flames (Fire):\n- Damage Effectiveness: %weapondamage_ per second\n- Total Damage: +%lvlscale_

Desc.eng: Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Duration is increased by %durationbonus_.
Enemies struck are set aflame and burn for %burningduration_ seconds, even after they leave the wall.
Mana cost is reduced by 20%.
Damage is increased by 20%.
Using the ink you jump to the designated location instantly.

XBox.eng: Using the ink you instantly jump ahead 20 meters in the direction where you are facing.

Desc.eng: As you ink jump away you deal %attack_ damage (%weapondamage_ of Weapon Damage) to enemies within 2 meters.
Upon arrival you heal yourself and your allies within 4 meters for %healpoints_ hit points (%heal_ of Weapon Damage).
Upon arrival you deal %attack_(1) damage (%weapondamage_ of Weapon Damage) to enemies within 2 meters.
The spell also recharges 20% of your maximum Mana.
Upon arrival you stun enemies within 4 meters for 2 seconds.
You teleport directly behind the target and cause physical damage to enemies within 3 meters.
Targets bleed for %durationbonus_ seconds, taking %dot_ of the received Arcane Assassination damage each second.
Upon arrival, you gain +%modifiervalue_(full_resistance)% bonus resistance (against all damage types) for %durationbonus_ seconds.
Targets have a %killchance_ chance to be killed instantly. (Powerful enemies may be immune to this.)
Target is frozen for 3 seconds.
The target is afflicted with 25% vulnerability for 5 seconds.

A bolt of lightning strikes the target point, doing lightning damage to anyone within 7 meters radius. The spell can be charged to do more damage (by keeping the button pressed) to a maximum of 10 charges. You cannot move while charging.

effect1.eng: Damage is increased by %chargepersec_ per %chargespeedScale_ second spent charging

Desc.eng: Enemies struck are paralyzed for %shockduration_ seconds.
Adds %physicaldamage_ Physical Damage.
Enemies struck have a %killchance_ chance to be killed instantly. (Powerful enemies may be immune to this.)
Enemies struck are knocked down if damage is greater than 25% of their Hit Points.
Within 3 meters of the target, all ranged enemies lose their ability to attack while melee enemies are half as likely to hit you.
The area of effect is increased by +%rangebonus_ meters.
Targets are also struck with %modifiervalue_(vulnerability)% vulnerability for the duration.
Targets are slowed by 30% for %customtime_ seconds.
Cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

Multiple waves of ice shards fall from the sky in a 4 meter circle around the target. Enemies in the area have a chance to be struck. Those who are, take ice damage and become slowed by 30% for 3 seconds.
Enemies struck are stunned for %stunduration_ seconds.
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Duration is increased by %durationbonus_ seconds.
Cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.

Boils the blood of an enemy from afar who takes physical damage while you keep the button pressed. Every shadow mark increases the damage by 5%. You also take damage from the strain and cannot move while channeling this spell.

effect0.eng: Damage (Physical):\n- Damage Effectiveness: %weapondamage_ per second\n- Total Damage: +%lvlscale_

effect1.eng: %casterdamage_ Physical Damage per second dealt to YOU

Desc.eng: Spell recharges %manapersec_ Mana per second.
Reduces the damage you cause to yourself by %casterdamagedecrease_.
Damage you cause to the target is increased by %damagebonus_.
Target is slowed by 70% (the effect may be reduced on powerful creatures).

Enemies within 4 meters of the target are slowed and struck with %vulnerability_ vulnerability. They also have a 10% chance to become friendly for several seconds, attacking other enemies. Those who do gain a damage bonus, and the above penalties are removed from them. Any shadow marks on the targets cumulatively increase the chance that they become friendly by 4%.

effect1.eng: Targets are slower by %chill_.

Desc.eng: The chance that enemies become friendly is increased by %charmchancebonus_.
Targets are afflicted by an additional %vulnerabilitybonus_ vulnerability.
Targets suffer %weapondamage_ of Weapon Damage as arcane damage.
Cooldown is reduced by %cooldowndecrease_ seconds.
Creates an illusionary copy of yourself which fights on your side. The defense, dodge and resistance statistics of the copy are based on your own statistics.

effect0.eng: The copy starts with %hp_ Hit Points (%casterhp_ of your Hit Points).

effect1.eng: The copy's damage is %attack_ (%weapondamage_ of Weapon Damage).

Desc.eng: The copy's damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
The copy's duration is increased by %durationbonus_ seconds.
The copy's hit points are increased by %hpbonus_.
Cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.
Creates a large ball of swirling void. Enemies caught in the void's 6 meter area of effect take heavy damage of all elemental types as well as arcane damage.

effect0.eng: Void (Combined):\n- Damage Effectiveness: %weapondamage_ per second\n- Total Damage: +%lvlscale_

Desc.eng: Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Enemies have a %killchance_ chance to be killed instantly. (Powerful enemies may be immune to this.)
Area of effect is increased by %radiusbonus_ meters.
Cooldown is reduced by %cooldowndecrease_.

Creates a %spoolwidth_ meters wide energy column at your location that seeks out the nearest enemy within 5 meters. While moving, the column looks for the nearest enemy periodically, choosing a random direction if none are within range. The column's touch does continuous damage of all elemental types as well as arcane damage.

effect0.eng: Column (Combined Damage):\n- Damage Effectiveness: %weapondamage_ per second\n- Total Damage: +%lvlscale_

effect1.eng: Mana upkeep: %manareserve_ of maximum Mana per active energy column.

Desc.eng: Duration is increased by %durationbonus_ seconds.
Enemies struck have a %shockchance_ chance to be paralyzed for 2 seconds.
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
The column moves 25% faster.
Creates a ball of energy that periodically blasts a single target within 10 meters with lightning.

effect0.eng: Ball (Lightning):\n- Damage Effectiveness: %weapondamage_ every half second\n- Total Damage: +%lvlscale_

effect1.eng: Mana upkeep: %manareserve_ of maximum Mana per active ball of lightning.

Desc.eng: Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Duration is increased by %durationbonus_ seconds.
Enemies struck have a %killchance_ chance to die instantly. (Powerful enemies may be immune to this.)
Targeting area of effect is increased by 3 meters.
You gain a bonus to your max Mana.
Increases Mana Regeneration by %manaregen_ while you are below 25% Mana.
Spell Cooldown is 1.5 times faster while you are at max Mana.
Your Spellcuffs and Staves recieve a bonus to their added Elemental and Arcane damage.

effect0.eng: %focusdamage_ bonus to Spellcuff and Staff added Elemental and Arcane damage.

Desc.eng: Any Spellcuffs you equip will deal Arcane damage.
You gain %elementalresist_ elemental resistance.

Launches a grenade forward that bounces off the ground and explodes upon impact, dealing physical damage to enemies within 1 meter of the impact point. If no enemies are hit, the grenade explodes after 2.5 seconds.
Blast radius is increased by %linkedrangebonus_ meters.
Enemies struck are ignited for 10 seconds, taking %dot_ of the original grenade damage each second.
Enemies within 5 meters of the target location suffer %dot_(1) of the original grenade damage (this stacks with the normal blast damage).
Enemies struck are knocked down if damage is greater than 25% of their Maximum Hit Points.
After the explosion, a smaller charge dealing 50% damage bounces on for a short distance.
A continuous attack that does fire damage in a 1 meter wide, 9 meters long streak while you keep the mouse button pressed.

effect0.eng: Hit (Fire):\n- Damage Effectiveness: %weapondamage_ per second \n- Total Damage: +%lvlscale_

Desc.eng: Damage is increased by %damagebonus_, but mana cost is also increased by %manabonus_.
Enemies are ignited for 10 seconds, taking %dot_ of received Phlogiston Torch damage each second.
Enemies have a %fearchance_ chance to flee for 4 seconds.
Mana cost is reduced by 20%.
The flame jet is extended to 11 meters.
A continuous attack that does fire damage in a 1 meter wide, 7 meters long streak.

effect0.eng: Hit (Fire):\n- Damage Effectiveness: %weapondamage_ per second\n- Total Damage: +%lvlscale_

effect1.eng: Costs %manacost_ Mana per second.

Desc.eng: Damage is increased by %damagebonus_, but mana cost is also increased by %manabonus_.
Enemies are ignited for 10 seconds, taking %dot_ of received Phlogiston Torch damage each second.
Enemies have a %fearchance_ chance to flee for 4 seconds.
Mana cost is reduced by 20%.
The flame jet is extended to 9 meters.
Creates a small, tough mechanical spider that can attack enemies with a short range electric arc.

effect0.eng:
Mechanoid (Lightning):
- Damage Effectiveness: %damage_ 
- Base DPH: %petDMG_ 
- Total Damage Increase: +%lvlscale_ 
- Mana Reserved: %manareserve_

effect1.eng: Hit points: %hp_

Desc.eng: Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Each spider has %customchance_ chance to paralyze targets for 3 seconds with each attack.
When a spider dies or disappears there is a %modifiervalue_(resurrect_chance)% chance that a new one is created.
The mechanical spiders have 10% additional Hp, and 10% additional damage.
Upon death, the mechanical spiders explode, dealing destruction equal to their attack damage.
Launches a fragmenting grenade, leaving a field of shrapnel upon explosion in a 3 meters radius. Enemies in the shrapnel field are slowed by 40% and take damage for 4 seconds.

effect1.eng: Shrapnel (Physical):\n- Damage Effectiveness: %weapondamage_(1) \n- Total Damage: +%lvlscale_(1)

Desc.eng: Blast radius increased by %linkedrangebonus_ meters.
Duration increased by +%skilldurationbonus_ seconds.
The shrapnel field also slows enemies by %format_(%)%modifiervalue_(speed).
The damage of the explosion is increased by +25% of Weapon Damage.
The shrapnel deals additional Poison Damage equal to 15% of Weapon Damage each second.

Places 3 explosive mines around you. If an enemy approaches a mine it detonates, causing physical damage to everyone within 1.5 meters. Laying new mines destroys any other mines you've previously created.
Blast radius increased by %linkedrangebonus_ meters.
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Enemies within %customrange_ meters are knocked back.
Adds 15% Fire Damage.
1 additional mine is deployed.

Creates a conical shaped poison cloud that damages enemies within its area and inflicts them with 15% vulnerability for 5 seconds. The cloud then persists and continues to damage enemies standing in it each second.

effect1.eng: Cloud (Poison):\n- Damage Effectiveness: %dotweapondamage_ per second\n- Total Damage: +%lvlscaleDOT_

Desc.eng: The cloud length is increased by %rangebonus_ meters.
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Enemies suffering from the cloud's vulnerability are also slowed by %modifiervalue_(speed)%.
Enemies suffering from the cloud's vulnerability are also slowed by 20%(stacks with the effect of the Numbing Agent powerup).
Vulnerabilty is increased to 25%.

Launches a mine to the target location, which arms itself 2 seconds after it lands. If an enemy approaches the mine it detonates, causing ice damage to everyone within 3 meters and slowing them for 3 seconds. (Note that you can only have a maximum of 3 mines at once. Laying a 4th mine destroys the one you've created first.)

effect1.eng: Targets are slowed by %modifiervalue_(speed)%

Desc.eng: The mine also freezes targets for %durationbonus_ seconds.
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Enemies slowed by the mine also suffer from +%modifiervalue_(vulnerability)% vulnerability while the slow effect lasts.
Arming time is decreased to 1 second.
The area of effect is increased by 1 meter.

Creates an arc that damages the target with electrical damage, then jumps to the nearest enemy within 5 meters. The arc jumps a maximum of 3 times, causing 80% of the damage caused to the previous target.
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Enemies struck are paralyzed for %durationbonus_ seconds.
The arc jumps an additional %advancecount_ times.
Damage caused to susbsequent targets is increased to 90%.
The arc jumps one additional time.
Creates a mechanical spider that can attack enemies at range with a heavy-bore rifle.

effect0.eng:
Mechanical Aide (Physical):
- Damage Effectiveness: %damage_ 
- Base DPH: %petDMG_

Desc.eng: The spider's damage is increased by %modifiervalue_(damage)%.
Changes the spiders' attack to an area of effect that causes %explosivedamage_ of the original damage.
The spiders' attacks have a %customchance_ chance to knock enemies back.
The spiders move 30% faster.
The spiders' attack range is increased by 4 meters.
Launches a cluster of 5 rockets at the target which damage enemies within 2 meters. The rockets always hit and do the listed damage individually.

effect0.eng: Per Rocket (Physical):\n- Damage Effectiveness: %weapondamage_ \n- Total Damage: +%lvlscale_

Desc.eng: Increases the number of rockets to %strikecount_.
The area of effect is increased by %linkedrangebonus_ meters.
Enemies are ignited for 10 seconds, taking %dot_ of the original damage each second.
Cooldown is reduced by 1 second.
Enemies are knocked down if damage is greater than 25% of their Maximum Hit Points.

Launches a mine to the target location, which arms itself 2 seconds after it lands. If an enemy approaches the mine it detonates, causing poison damage to everyone within 1.5 meters and afflicting them with 25% vulnerability for 10 seconds. The poison cloud then persists for 5 seconds and continues to damage enemies each second. (Note that you can only have a maximum of 3 mines at once. Laying a 4th mine destroys the one you've created first.)

effect1.eng: Cloud does %attack_(1) Poison damage per second.

Desc.eng: Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Enemies suffering from the mine's vulnerability are also slowed by %modifiervalue_(speed)%.
Blast radius increased by %linkedrangebonus_ meters.
Arming time is decreased to 1 second.
Vulnerabilty is increased to 35%.
A continuous attack that does ice damage in a 1 meter wide, 7 meters long streak while you keep the mouse button pressed. Targets have a chance to be frozen.

effect1.eng: Targets have a %basechance_ chance to be frozen.

Desc.eng: Enemies struck have a %customchance_ chance to be frozen for an additional %durationbonus_ seconds.
Enemies struck also suffer from +%modifiervalue_(vulnerability)% vulnerability for 3 seconds.
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_, but mana cost is also increased by %manabonus_.
Mana cost is reduced by 20%.
The frost jet is 2 meters longer.

Launches an electric device to the target location, which activates itself 1 second after it lands. If an enemy approaches the device within 3 meters an electric arc shocks each enemy within 8 meters. The arcs then jump to another enemy within 3 meters, causing 80% of the damage caused to the first target. (Note that you can only have a maximum of 3 devices at once. Placing a fourth one destroys the device you've created first.
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Enemies struck are paralyzed for %durationbonus_ seconds.
The arc jumps an additional %advancecount_ times.
Damage caused to susbsequent targets is increased to 90%.
The device no longer takes time to activate itself.
Places a 5 meter radius target sign on the ground marking the area for artillery barrage. The shells arrive with a 2 second delay, causing physical and fire damage to enemies.
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Enemies within 6 meters of the target location suffer %dot_(1) of the original Artillery damage (this stacks with the normal blast damage).
Enemies are ignited for 10 seconds, taking %dot_ of the original Artillery damage.
Delay between activation and the barrage is decreased by 1 second.
Enemies are knocked down if damage is greater than 25% of their Maximum Hit Points.
Your mechanical allies receive part of your Defense.

effect0.eng: Mechanical allies gain %modifiervalue_(minion_defense) of your Defense

Desc.eng: Your mechanical allies have 10% more Hit Points.
Your mechanical allies continuously self-repair at a rate of 1% Maximum Hit Points per second.
Your mechanical allies receive a bonus to their damage.
Your mechanical allies move 10% faster.
Your mechanical allies regain 10% of their Maximum Hit Points with each succesful attack.
Your mechanical allies receive part of your Resistances.

effect0.eng: Mechanical allies gain %modifiervalue_(minion_resistances) of your Resistances

Desc.eng: Your mechanical allies last 20% longer.
The cooldowns of all your mechanical ally skills and tricks are reduced by 10%.
Slows the world to half speed around you while you remain able to act normally.

PVP.eng: Slows the world to half speed around you while you remain able to act normally. Does not affect other players!

effect0.eng: Slows time to half for %skillduration_ seconds

Desc.eng: Cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.
You gain 5% damage bonus while the spell is active.
Using up all of your mana you create a large explosion that damages enemies within 5 meters around you, burning, shocking and freezing them.
Enemies are knocked down if damage is greater than 25% of their Hit Points.
Area of effect is increased to 7 meters.
Enemies within a circular area are slowed to the speed of the slowest enemy among them.

effect0.eng: Slows enemies in a %range_ meters radius area

Desc.eng: Enemies struck have both movement and attack speed slowed by 20%.
Enemies struck are also afflicted with 10% vulnerability.
Significantly boosts your elemental resistance and moderately boosts your physical and poison resistances for 15 seconds.

effect1.eng: 50% of the elemental resistance percentage bonus applied to physical and poison resistance.

Desc.eng: Duration increased by %durationbonus_ seconds.
Gain %hpregenbonus_ HP regeneration per second.
Gain a %speedbonus_ speed bonus.
The physical and poison resistances now gain 75% of the elemental resistance percentage bonus.
The physical and poison resistances now gain 100% of the elemental resistance percentage bonus.
As you move, your feet ignite the ground behind you causing it to burn for 5 seconds. Enemies who pass through the flames are burned.

effect0.eng: %attack_ Fire damage (%weapondamage_ of Weapon Damage) per second

Desc.eng: Cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.
Enemies passing through the flames are ignited for 5 seconds, taking 50% of the original flame damage each second.

Summons an illusionary beast who fights beside you for 20 seconds. Its abilities are based on your statistics. If the beast dies before disappearing, it creates an explosion causing physical damage in 4 meters radius. This damage is based on your Weapon Damage.

effect0.eng: The ally starts with %hp_ Hit Points (%casterhppercent_ of your Hit Points)

effect1.eng: The ally's attack damage is %weapondamage_ of Weapon Damage

effect2.eng: The ally's explosion damage is %blastdamage_ of Weapon Damage

Desc.eng: The beast's damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
The beast's HP is increased by %hpbonus_.
The beast's death explosion damage is increased by %blastdamagebonus_.
Duration is increased by 10 seconds.
Explosion radius is increased to 6 meters.
All enemies within 3 meters around you will run away in panic for 3 seconds (The effect may be reduced or negated on powerful enemies).

effect0.eng: Panicked enemies are afflicted with %vulnerability_ vulnerability

Desc.eng: Duration is increased by %feardurationbonus_ seconds.
Panicked enemies heal you for %healpertarget_ of your maximum HP.
Panicked enemies move %slow_ slower.
The area of effect is increased by %radiusbonus_ meters.
Increases vulnerability effect by %vulnerabilitybonus_.
Calls down a meteor to the target location. The meteor arrives with a 2 second delay, causing physical damage to enemies within 7 meters.
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Enemies struck are ignited for 5 seconds, taking %dot_ of the original meteor damage each second.
Enemies struck have a %knockdownchance_ chance to be knocked down.
Cooldown is reduced by %cooldowndecrease_.
Impact delay is reduced by %durationdecrease_.
Mana cost is decreased by %manacostdecrease_.
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Gain damage reduction against ranged attacks.
You also gain a %defense_ Defense bonus against ranged attacks.
Ranged hits you suffer add %rageperstruck_ point to your Rage.
All damage you cause with Fire based skills is enhanced.
Mana cost of your Fire based skills is reduced by 10%.
Cooldown of your Fire based skills is reduced by 10%.
All damage you cause with Lightning based skills is enhanced.
Mana cost of your Lightning based skills is reduced by 10%.
Cooldown of your Lightning based skills is reduced by 10%.
All damage you cause with Ice based skills is enhanced.
Mana cost of your Ice based skills is reduced by 10%.
Cooldown of your Ice based skills is reduced by 10%.
Increases your mana regeneration.

effect0.eng: %modifiervalue_(mana_regeneration_percent)% of your maximum Mana is recharged per second.

Desc.eng: Your Mana Regeneration is increased by an additional 2% of your Max Mana.
Each hit you suffer recharges %manaperhit_ of you maximum Mana.

Creates an elyctric sphere around you, providing complete invulnerability but also blocking movement and offensive skills. You also gain back 20% of your Maximum HP and Mana per second and cooldowns will expire faster while in the Sphere.
Regeneration is increased to 25% per second.
Duration is increased by 1 second.
This powerful modification to your exoskeletal suit makes you extremely resistant to damage for a short period of time.
Duration is increased by %durationbonus_ seconds.
Gain %damagereduction_ damage reduction.
Invulnerability for %invulnerability_ seconds.
Regenerates 1% of your max Mana with each hit.
Duration is increased by 1 second.
Regenerates %manaperhit_ of your max Mana with each hit.
Duration increased by %durationbonus_ seconds.
Cooldown is reduced by %cooldownbonus_ seconds.
Each hit heals you for %hpperhit_ of your max hitpoints.
Using your jetpack, you can jump to great distances, dealing damage within 3.5 meters upon arrival. (Note that this is highly experimental technology and won't allow you to jump over obstacles.)
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Enemies within 4 meters of your point of origin are slowed by 60% for %slowbonus_ seconds.
Enemies struck are stunned for %stunduration_ seconds.
Increases the damage area by 1 meter.
Targets are knocked down if damage is greater than 25% of their Hit Points
Burnout gives you significant boosts for 4 seconds but makes you weaker for 10 seconds afterwards.

Desc.eng: Bonuses last +%durationbonus_ seconds longer.
Heals %healbonus_ of maximum HP.
Grants invulnerability for %invulnerability_ seconds.

Increases duration of the positive effects by 2 seconds.

%hpregenbonus_ HP regenerated per second.

You create an irrational barrier into existence from the Ink in front of you that can absorb enemy projectiles while its hitpoints last.

effect0.eng: The wall has %hitpoints_ of your hitpoints.

The wall is invulnerable for %invulnerability_ seconds.
The wall reflects 200% of the damage suffered back to the attackers.
The wall regenerates 3% of your Mana per second while within 5 meters.

Creates an immobile missile turret that shoots rocket bursts at enemies within 18 meters. Its damage is dependant on your Exoskeletal Core and Military Aptitude attributes. The missiles do area damage within 2 meters of their impact point.

effect0.eng: The turret's base damage is %attack_ Physical damage (%damage_ of Weapon Damage)

Desc.eng: The turret reloads less often.

Creates a mechanical spider rigged with explosives which will charge at enemies if they get within 11 meters. The blast triggered at the target causes damage within 2.5 meters. If the aide is destroyed before it reaches the target, no explosion will occur. You can have up to 4 at a time.

Enemies are ignited for 5 seconds, taking %dotbonus_ of the original explosion damage each second.

This device allows Fulmigati to charge you with his automaton. Destroying the device will take away that ability.
This device allows Fulmigati to quickly repair his automaton from time to time. Destroying the device will take away that ability.
This device powers the laser gun of Fulmigati's automaton. Destroying the device will prevent Fulmigati from firing the laser.
This device powers the energy shield of Fulmigati's automaton. Destroying the device will prevent Fulmigati from recharging it.
This device guides the missiles lauched by of Fulmigati's automaton. Destroying the device will prevent the missiles from locking on you.
